name: Hadley Coan
text: Love this little local shop. I shopped for my own kids at Purple Peanut over 25 years ago and now I get to shop here for my grandchildren! They have the best selection of clothing and shoes for infants though early childhood plus fun gifts for birthday parties and more! Their great customer service is a bonus. :)

name: Macey Johnson
text: The absolute BEST children’s boutique in town!! Very impressed with the staff and their professional help to find exactly what you’re looking for, and more!😋 Always so nice and helpful when I come in this store. Clean and organized environment. Highly recommended to anyone looking for the cutest & unique children’s clothing. 💜💜

name: Kelby Copeland
text: The absolute BEST place for children’s clothes! The staff is so friendly, I highly recommend this place to all my friends and family!

name: Wynn Thomas
text: The best children’s boutique in North Alabama hands down!! 💜

name: Seth Meek
text: Terrible service. went in to buy 2 bogg bags and the girl working couldn't even take a moment to get off her cell phone to help.

resp.text: Hi Seth, my name is Alicia and I am the owner. I would love to talk to you. I am so sorry to hear about this and will address this with my girls… as they aren’t allowed to be on their phones when we have customers in the store. Please contact me through private message on our purple peanut Facebook page. I am deeply sorry.. and will have this taken care of immediately.!! We absolutely love our customers and want nothing more than to give you the best customer service 💜

name: Kanisha Mixon
text: Very Personable staff! Beautiful and clean environment. I will definitely become a regular customer!!

name: Jessica Lambert
text: We had the absolute best experience at the Purple Peanut today. We found everything we needed and then some! The staff was amazing. .. not only were they sweet and helpful but they left us alone to try on tons of clothing. Because of that, there was no pressure and we were able to think and take time finding the perfect items. We will definitely be back! If you have a little girl that is starting to get hard to fit (my daughter is 8), this place is perfect! The clothing is still innocent and is so nicely made! Thank you Purple Peanut for a great day of shopping !!

name: Brandie Hodges
text: Best clothing intown

name: Sara Alavi
text: This boutique has a great selection of children's clothing and gift items (as well as the best smelling candles). They also have the most wonderful service and caring employees making it comfortable and a joy to shop there.

resp.text: Aww!!..Thank you so much Sara!! We look forward to seeing you again soon!!

name: Google Reviewer
text: Cute clothing and gifts at great prices from a friendly shop owner!

name: Melissa Jones
text: This is a cute little boutique that carries fashionable merchandise for women and children. It's a new business to our community and my first time shopping here. The owner carries some of my favorite bands that I order online with similar boutiques and have to pay shipping! Well not anymore because I will continue to shop local. The owner is so nice and knowledgeable about her merchandise and fashions of today. I love my dress I bought and love the fact I didn't have shipping costs! I recommend this boutique to all.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words and your business! I am so thankful for you and look forward to seeing you again! 😊

name: Stephanie Welter
text: Great little boutique we found while on our trip to Gulf Shores.  Very reasonable prices and friendly staff. Cute clothes and gifts.

resp.text: Thank you so much Stephanie! We are so thankful for your kind words! Hope to see you guys next time! 😍

name: Maryann Nicolaou
text: Great selection of unique, cute, and affordable children’s clothing. Best in the Gulf Shores area. Also fun and comfortable clothing for adults.  Stop in, you’ll be glad you did!

resp.text: Thank you so much Maryann for your kind words! We are so thankful for your business!

name: Brina Haga
text: Great boutique! If you are looking for adorable sibling sets, try here! Very competitive prices! Clothes wash well too.

resp.text: Thank you so much for shopping with us Brina! Hope to see you again soon!

name: Emily Hulsey
text: This place is so cute!! Definitely a must-visit when in Gulf Shores!

name: Emily Hulsey
text: This place is so cute!! Definitely a must-visit when in Gulf Shores!

name: Courtney Jones
text:
My kids and I stumbled into this store today on a quest to find secondhand furniture for my son’s bedroom.  When I opened the door and saw all of the gorgeous, high quality decor and gifts I immediately looked at my kids and said, “DON’T TOUCH ANYTHING!” The owner, Lulu, immediately welcomed us like family and took my three boys on a journey through her store. She and my oldest became fast friends as they bonded over all the crystals, gemstones, and fossils.
This store is such a unique place full of gorgeously, curated pieces at every price point. We will be going back ASAP because I’m kicking myself for not buying a piece of wall decor that I want and also because we want to hang out with Lulu again!

resp.text: Omg .. you and your family are amazing warm   hearted people ♥.  I enjoy hanging out.  You all are welcome anytime 😊.  Looking forward to seeing you guys soon.  God bless 🙏

name: opal armistead
text: Amazing inventory! Very eclectic mix that guarantees you won't walk out of the doors empty handed. If you're looking for that one of a kind conversation piece,  this is the place to be! Definitely recommend to my friends.

name: Scot Reeves
text: This place is truly amazing. Beautiful, interesting things curated from all over the world. Definitely worth a stop. The owner is an absolute delight. One of my favorite places.

name: Mona Davidson
text: Absolutely loved this little place! The owner was wonderful as well, so friendly, knowledgeable & helpful. I am in love with the 2 rings I bought and can't wait to go back.

name: Matt Moss
text: This place has something for everyone!  The shop owner is amazing and has an eye for everything BEAUTIFUL.  You wont be disappointed.  Stop in and say hello.

name: Brittany Sasser
text: I absolutely LOVE this store!! There is literally something for everyone. When you walk in, you feel better. It’s a truly magical place!!

name: wanda white
text: Great place to browse. Super friendly

name: Breanna Furline
text: The best jewelry and unique items! Also the owner is the sweetest!! Some of my most favorite jewelry pieces are from. Gypsy!

name: Krys Smith
text: This store has something for everyone! It has such a fun eclectic vibe and LuLu is such a beautiful person.

text: Owner reached out to ask what could be improved. Loved that. Had to edit my rating.

text: I love this shop! My favorite is the jewelry! The owner is the sweetest, a must visit!

name: Dayana Pickard
text: Will not be disappointed!!!!

name: Rosemary Davidson
text: Very kind and helpful staff. Also sells under Little River Sock Mill. Socks made in the previous sock capital of the world.  Comfortable socks. All organic material.

name: Andrea Ray
text:
Take the time to find this little shop. They have a great selection and the socks are amazing. We bought several pair. The pair I got just because I thought they were cute, fit so well and are very comfortable...great quality. I bought some that were on sale because they looked comfy and they feel amazing. I have put on a pair at the end of the day...everyday since I got them.
The ladies working there were so friendly. We were passing through on a rainy day and they talked to us like old friends and were happy to answer any questions and offer info to help with selections.
The store is several hours from my home but I plan to return...just for socks. But I will probably shop online before then. A+ for made in Alabama!

name: Drew Taylor
text: By far the best socks I have in my drawer. I only buy zkano now. It's worth the cost and it makes you feel even better buying products Made in America. Will keep buying as long as they keep making them.

name: Suann White
text: Great socks

name: Richard Rhone
text: Very small and certainly the prices are not discounted.  Not worth the visit as it's simply a tiny retail store with nothing sold that you can't find on-line

name: Cindi Jones
text: Creative, well made, local.  Love!

name: Jacqui Sweet
text: It's so nice to have customer service...and so rare!

name: Allison Kluz
text: I love this boutique! I frequently walk the shopping center at Inverness Corners when I run my errands. I always stop at the outside sales rack and I always buy something. I work for myself now, and although the prices are in line with other boutiques, I shop sales at this point. EVERY TIME I am treated as though I am buying $200 worth of clothes. Today I bought a top that I love and the owner and staff gave me ideas on how to wear it and then wrapped it carefully in a shopping bag with tissue. If you don't think you like the "boutique experience," go somewhere else. But you'll be wearing what everyone else has on. I have worked retail, exchange only discourages people wearing it to the game or the party, then trying to return it. Yes, people do that. And yes, people steal. And yes, it is spelled out in their policies. I am so glad this store is right in my neighborhood!

name: Steve Morris
text: Very attentive, wonderful items. Made shopping for the ladies in my life easy. All I had was pictures and they viewed them making suggestions. I pleased my wife, mother, daughter, daughter-in-law, granddaughter and niece. Thanks Sylvia!

name: Linda Kyriacou
text: I am a frequent visitor to the boutique and every time I am amazed at the spectacular variety of fashionable clothes and matching accessories. The staff are always extremely helpful and polite offering expert help and advice. I  get many compliments from my friends for my outfits and I always recommend that they shop there. Gameday in Style is my favourite boutique to shop !!

name: Michelle Smitherman
text: I love working at this boutique!  My greatest pleasure is helping a customer find fashionable outfits that make them feel confident and look their best.  Also if I can touch someone who is having a trying day and make them smile it makes my job more fulfilling ! 😍

name: martha ledlow
text: Love the clothes and the sales personnel have always been very helpful.

name: elsie johnson
text: I am not sure why the other reviewers give a boutique a bad review , when the store policy is exchange only and is clearly stated on the receipt. Most boutiques have just exchange only and I found that the sales associates are super in putting outfits together and focus on the customer. I would recommend this to all my friends!!!

name: Jessica Morris
text: This is the by far the BEST boutique in town.  The store is huge and has such a great selection of regular & plus size clothing and the prices are great!  New items get put out daily so there is always new, fun & trendy clothing, shoes & accessories!  The owner is AWESOME, if you ask her to be on the look out for a certain style or color of clothing she will put it aside and call to tell you what she has found.  She is also the accessory queen.  She is great at picking outfits for any age or size and does an amazing job accessorizing them!  I have NEVER had a  bad experience when shopping at Gameday In Style.  My friends and I always stop in to see what's new.

name: Sarah Labriola
text: Great selection, found just what I was looking for!  Owner offered to gift wrap my purchase, I will definitely be back!

name: Nanette Rasberry
text: BUYER BEWARE!!!!!!  This place is a COMPLETE RIP OFF. The clothes are not worth a piece of crap and then their policy is STORE CREDIT ONLY. That should tell you all you need to know right there. I will NEVER shop at this place again. OWNER IS RUDE TOO. I will make sure I post to all my social media outlets as well.

resp.text: Nanette, as all stores, we have a clearly displayed store Return policy, which also appears on every receipt.  Most boutiques have an exchange only store policy and we never have a problem with any of our customers, because exchanges are easy and we constantly bring new merchandise in the store. If you do not find something right away, our store credit is good for 6 months, which is much longer than most stores. Sorry that you feel that you were not treated well, because our customer service is very important to us and we go way and above to have a satisfied customer!

name: Y. Spencer
text: Nice place, sweet sales people, got the best dress!!!!

name: Anna Gleason
text: Rude owner, overpriced clothes, only friendly to white people

resp.text: Anna we do not only cater to white people. We have a lot of great, loyal African American Ladies that frequently shop with us. Our customers also often comment how well priced our clothing is compared to other boutiques in the area. You commented in another post that you were upset that you did not get  a refund, when the store policy clearly states that we only accept exchanges. Our return policy is posted at the cash register and also appears on every receipt. Sorry that you feel that you were not treated right, because our customer satisfaction is very important to us!

name: Preston Franklin
text: Called ahead to be sure they could do custom monogram in one day  (something simple). They agreed and said that will be no problem,  just a $10 rush fee. I arrived to be told this was not true and they would not help me. This place was out of the way but had great reviews so I thought they would honor what they had said on the phone. It's too bad that they over-promised and lost my business forever.

resp.text: Sorry we could not do rush order at the moment you came in. We told you as we do all customers that we do rush orders when it is available.  1pm on Saturday afternoon is too late to get a rush monogram before close of business that day.  It was not possible to do today.  I'm sorry you feel that you were wronged.  We have very good customer service and try to go out of our way for every monogram and customer.  You left in such a hurry,  you didn't give us a chance to even try to help you.

text:
One of the most unfriendly boutiques I have been to in the Birmingham. I can in and there was only one other customer shopping at the time. Two employees were standing in the back near check out. I spent probably 10 minutes browsing and looking at what they had to offer.
Nobody spoke to me when I came in.
Nobody offered assistance while I shopped.
Nobody spoke to me as I left.
If you're looking for cute gifts and things you may find them here, if customer service and Southern charm is what you're looking for I highly recommend anywhere else.

resp.text:
Hi Nikki, we sincerely apologize!   The staff there on that day was new and we have since additionally trained her regarding prompt customer service.  We really pride ourselves as being friendly and prompt but also we try to get to know our customer's taste to better serve them and even order things you may be looking for.
Also, thank you so much for your input and the compliment about our cute gifts!  Please come back and get your next single item 40% off - just ask for Mary Katherine.

name: Alexandria Hatfield
text:
Both summer AND winter clothing. I dropped off 5-6 bins full of men’s khaki shorts, khaki pants, jeans, dress shirts, & athletic gear. ***ALL are brand names such as POLO Ralph Lauren, J.Crew, Patagonia, Vineyard Vines, Coastal Cotton, Southern Marsh, Nike/Adidas, & much more!

***Most items are NEW w/ TAGS or barely worn clothes! All items are in GREAT CONDITION.*** (size 29-32 in mens/boys pants. Men’s size Small & Medium in shirts. Some “boys XL 18-20” in dress shirts as well.)

This is my brother’s first year at West Point (go Army!). He isn’t allowed to come home very much these next 4 years, so we have cleaned out his entire closet & have taken ALL of his clothes to Fashion Exchange in Athens, AL!

These clothes will only be allowed to stay on the floor for just 3 months. Go check them out soon!

name: Mary Portland
text: I'm only giving 1 star because they don't have petites. I love the clothes, just wish they had petites, as regular sized clothes AREN'T PROPORTIONED for petites, and contrary to what folks tell you when you visit to buy, SMALL AND EXTRA-SMALL ARE NOT THE SAME... wrong proportions. I do like the clothes, and would buy them if they were in my size.

resp.text: Hello Mary, I know you gave us this review a few months back and I thought we had responded to you! I am sorry it's so late. As for petites ... this is a tough one! Most manufacturers do not produce true petites any longer. In fact none of our manufacturers do. In understanding this we do our best to try to find tops with shorter torsos and pants with shorter lengths. I am sorry we were not able to offer those sizes! Please do come back and visit, we have fabulous jewelry and our staff would be happy to help find items that might work for you!

name: kimberly mccauley
text: Love this jewelry store!  Nice selection, reasonable prices, and super friendly and helpful staff. It’s a must visit when in this area.

resp.text: Thanks so much Kimberly! We appreciate you coming to visit💗

name: Lee Hicks
text:
SUPER SERVICE!!! Everyone goes over board to make sure you are pleased with their work.
I would recommend using them for any of your jewelry needs.
Cannot tell you how happy I am with their work!!!

resp.text:
Lee, Thanks so much for the super review! We appreciate you choosing us!
Blessings,
From all of us at Dj’s

name: Crystal Buzard
text: We love the girls at Diamond Jewelers. They are the sweetest ever. My husband buys me jewelry every year for our Anniversary there the jewelry is always beautiful and very high quality!!!

resp.text: We appreciate you so much! Thanks for being a part of the Diamond Jewelers family.

name: Sharon Hawthorne
text: Our family loved to shop at Diamond jewelers! They are always friendly courteous and knowledgeable.  Such Gorgeous and Unique pieces of Jewelry!  I recommend Diamond Jewelers to all of my friends. Thank u Daphne, Lorrie, Dawn and Stephanie ! Y’all are exceptional!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Sheri! We love what we do and blessed to have friends like you to come visit and shop 💝

name: allym205
text: The staff members at this store are amazing. Stephanie helped me with information about ring sizing and was super sweet. She seemed genuinely interested in my engagement! Unfortunately, due to my warranty plan on my ring, I was unable to have my ring sized through Diamond Jewelers but I will be back for bands! Thanks again Stephanie!

resp.text: Thank you for the super kind words! I’m very excited for you. Enjoyed talking to you and appreciate you stopping by to see us.

name: Jennifer Spruiell
text: Stellar service and fast with two repairs for me. Always so welcoming and attentive. Feels like family. I like to go to a place where they call you by name and treat you like you are the most important matter of the day. Amazing!

resp.text: Thank you for the sweet comment Jennifer, we always enjoy your company ❤️

name: Tanner Howard
text: Diamond Jewelers is my favorite jewelry store, not only due to their great selection, but more importantly, their service. I'm always treated kindly, and the staff goes out of it's way to make their customers happy. The owners are extremely generous, and we are fortunate to have this family-owned business in our community.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Tanner. We appreciate the positive feedback 💗

name: Kelli Perkins
text:
At First when I walked in I thought, oh my I just possibly could be in the wrong place as far as my budget goes. Then was  immediately greeted by a warm smiling face! I  quickly realized I was going to be able to shop here. Laurie was outstanding, she knew all  The answers to my questions and those that she did not she quickly found the answer!
After purchasing something, I decided to get them to repair my jewelry that I was looking for a jeweler to do.  I just found  where I will be doing my jewelry shopping and recommending family and friends !!!!!!!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words. It was so nice to meet you Kelli, looking  forward to seeing you soon. Have a Merry Christmas

name: Denise B. Owens
text: Always a pleasure to shop at Diamond Jewelers. Dawn McKenzie is truly a blessing. She knows the perfect thing to show you out of a choice of millions. Great customer service in the store or by telephone.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words. We appreciate your business.

name: Jeanette Breault
text: They shipped out the order and arrived two days earlier than promised with a hand written Thank You! on the receipt. Very nice.

resp.text: Thank you Jeanette, glad your order came earlier than expected. And many thanks for the kind review 💗😊

name: Katelin Wilkins
text: What an amazing experience! I was so sad to drop my engagement ring off. It is a family piece and I didn't want to part with it long. I dropped it off on Monday morning and had it back on my finger 2 days later. They not only cleaned and buffed it, but they replaced prongs, took it down nearly 2 sizes and gave me a measurement on the carat weight of the center diamond. The fit is perfect and I could not be happier! Thank you so so much Diamond Jewelers!

resp.text: So happy you are pleased Katelin. We appreciate you💝

name: Maves Youngblood
text: The place was packed! Standing room only! And, yet, I was immediately greeted, directed to the right person and assisted. Professional, speedy and fairly priced. What else can you ask for? Great experience.

resp.text: Thank you Maves! I’m glad we could serve you in a timely manner. We appreciate you being patient? It does get a little busy 💝

name: Guelph Ontario
text: Have always had a great experience with Diamond Jewelers in Gulf Shores. Today was not. I will not return to Diamond Jewelers ever again. I did not enjoy the rude and condescending attitude Daphne exhibited towards me. I’ve never been treated that way in the past. But I’ll tell you it was enough to put me off from ever spending any of my hard earned money there again. Do yourself a favor and drive to Manning Jewelry in Foley. The staff there was beyond friendly. I’ll be doing business with Manning from here on out. Diamond Jewelers might need a little refresher on customer service.

resp.text:
I'm saddened to read this, in no way whatsoever did I realize that I was being condescending. This is my family's store and I'm so grateful to everyone that comes through the door. I truly did not mean to come across in a negative way that was not my intention. I want to offer you a $50 gift card from me.

My deepest apologies

name: Patty King
text: Such sweet people. I think it was “Lorrie” who helped me the last 2 visits. She is so kind, professional, and knowledgeable.  She greets me with a welcoming smile as soon as I walk in the door.  One of the tiny stones had fallen out of my sterling silver ring that I’ve had for months, and Lorrie made sure to get it fixed in just 2 days (so I would have it for my trip out of town). Just wonderful!  I will always be a Diamond World customer. Thank you.

resp.text: Thank you Patty! I appreciate the sweet compliment. Hope you have a Happy Mother’s Day 💝

name: Jennifer Clough
text: Absolutely love Diamond Jewelers.  Had my engagement ring sized and it fits perfectly.  They also shined and puffed it and it looks amazing. Definitely will be using them in the future for all my jewelry needs. Stephanie is very sweet and super professional.

resp.text: Thanks Jennifer!! It was so nice meeting you & that precious Lennox!! We appreciate you coming in!! Enjoy your pretty ring! Take Care! Stephanie

name: Jackie Wireman
text: I had to return a product that I purchased a few months ago they were so pleasant with no questions gladly gave me a new product and it was a great great visit I would go there anytime for anything they stand behind all their products what more can you ask for I would recommend their beautiful shop to everybody Jackie Wireman

resp.text: Thanks Ms. Jackie!! We always love our visits with you! :)

name: Debbie Walters
text: Wonderful experience. My Apple Watch band got stuck on the watch. Took it in and the Jeweler was able to fix it right away. While I was waiting I inquired about a tennis necklace pendant. The ladies were so helpful. They found the tennis racket pendant and also helped me pick out a one really nice chain. Will definitely keep going back. Everyone was so pleasant and helpful.

resp.text: We appreciate your business Debbie! Thank you for the kind words

name: Megann Steege
text: I will definitely be returning to Diamond Jewelers! Top of the line selections, and the staff was amazing. Jeff Goodman went above and beyond to make my experience one to remember.

resp.text: Thank you Megann, you’re  the best and we appreciate all that you do for our city

name: Debbie Phares
text: Found the perfect item. Diamond Jewelers had a good selection. Lorrie was very friendly and helpful. The jeweler will have our item ready in a day or earlier.  To get personal attention, fair prices, and great service visit Diamond Jewelers first.

resp.text: Thank you Debbie! We are thankful you chose us. Hope you have a Happy Mother’s Day 💝

name: D Kirkdoffer
text: Stephanie is one of the nicest sales persons! Her sweet spirit is contagious!  And she is very knowledgeable of fine jewelry. Thanks to her we will visit again.

resp.text: You are the sweetest! Thank you for the kind words. I love where I work and you make my job extra special. Sorry for getting this message so late 💝

name: Missy Tyler
text: I stopped in to have links removed from a Tag watch. Although I spent very little, the staff treated me like a dear friend. That is typical of this lovely shop. We love Diamond Jewelers, especially Lorrie!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words Missy! We love our sweet customers & appreciate you coming in!! Take Care! Lorrie

name: Blake Rowell
text: Fantastic service at every turn. You can’t go wrong here.

resp.text: Thank you Missy, we really appreciate the kind  words 💗

name: Maureen Crawford
text:
Very friendly and helpful people! We were visiting from Illinois. Our small town no longer has a full service local jeweler, and we needed a ring cut off, a replacement earring back, and some pieces cleaned. Ours was not a high ticket purchase, but we were treated as if it were.
They have some beautiful pieces, and a beautiful store!

resp.text: Maureen, that is so sweet! Thanks for taking the time to message the generous comment, please come see us again 💕

name: Cyndie Pankonien
text: I found this store from an ad they had in a travelers station when we were passing through. I contacted them about Pandora charms they had for their area & ordered some for my mom and myself. She has since passed away and this was the last trip we took together.  I noticed my dangle on my charm was missing. I called as soon as I noticed it. They were so kind to send me a replacement charm at a discounted price. I highly recommend this business!! Thank you Diamond Jewelers for helping me to keep my memory keepsake!!!

resp.text: Thank you for the sweet personal message, hoping you have the best New Year ahead and may you be blessed with much joy!

name: Shane Smith
text: Always, very friendly and helpful.

name: Debra Tarr
text: Always the best service and quality!  Picked out a beautiful necklace for my nieces high school graduation. Amazing staff and amazing service. I will be a regular forever :-).

resp.text: Thanks Mrs. Debra!! It's always good to see you! I know your niece will love her necklace! We appreciate you & love some Rita's!!! :)

name: Yessicaa CohRin
text: They are always welcoming with a smile! Love the pandora section my girlfriend gets me rings for every holiday from there! I had a stone fall out and they replaced it within a day! Very good prices and well worth the money!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind comment. We appreciate you choosing us!

name: Annette Ross
text: Wonderful shop! As always, Lorie was a "jewel "!  Have made several purchases and plan to make more in the future! A hometown atmosphere that is hard to beat! A great staff! Thanks for always making me feel welcome!

resp.text: Thank you Annette! We appreciate the kind words!

name: judy blair
text: I I purchased a very nice Pandora charm at Diamond Jewelers in Gulf l Shoes, Alabama today. The girl who waited on me was very familiar with their Pandora merchandise. The store had  Pandora charms for both Gulf Shoes and Orange Beach. Their prices were very reasonable. I will see them next year for another charm.  I think you should check them out!

resp.text:
Mrs. Judy,
Thank you so much for your kind words! I enjoyed helping you with your Pandora charm! I hope you enjoy it, and we look forward to seeing you next year! Don't hesitate to call if you need anything at all!
Sincerely,
Mary Kathryn

name: Courtney Steffek
text: Fantastic service, warm, caring and professional staff! Great place to trust with your valuables.  LOVE LOVE LOVE these people!

name: Barbara Killam
text: I love Diamond Jewelry!!!!  Lorrie and the sales staff are so sweet and helpful!  I try to purchase all my Pandora bracelets and charms from them!  They have the best selection!

resp.text: We love you Barbara and always look forward to seeing g you and catching up. 💜

name: Nancy Shawhan
text: Super friendly staff, always willing to go the extra mile to take care of customers!  Love, love, LOVE Diamond Jewelry (the store, not actual diamond jewelry... well, wait... love that too. So, I actually love both Diamond Jewelry and jewelry with diamonds.). :)

name: Tina Dalton
text: I am new to Diamond Jewelers and have found my jewelers.  My engagement ring and wedding set are gorgeous.  The staff is fabulous and such a pleasure. We will go nowhere else.

resp.text: Your the best Tina! We had so much fun with you today! Hope you guys have the best New Year!

name: Dale Mikkelsen
text: Love Diamond Jewelers. Love everything I have purchased. The owners and employees are awesome! My favorite jewelry store! 😊

resp.text: Thank you Dale! Lots of love sweet friend 💝

name: Sarah Forbis
text: A big thank you to Dawn and the jeweler for their quick and thorough attention to my wedding band (accidentally stepped on and bent). They were able to fix, replace the diamond lost and polish up in less than 24 hours at a very competitive and fair price.  Thanks so much for your help!

name: Kim Edgerton
text: Beautiful store and excellent service always!   The staff is always very friendly, helpful and patient while I browse around looking for just the right items!

resp.text: Thank you for choosing us Kim, We hope you have a  great Thanksgiving with your family 💕

name: Bill S
text: Awesome service! Very reasonable prices!

resp.text: Thank you Bill! Hope to see you again soon 😊

name: Connie King
text: We have used Diamond Jewelers for a couple years! Very professional staff and helpful. Stephanie has always gone above and beyond to meet our needs. I highly recommend them for whatever your jewelry needs are!

resp.text: You are so sweet Mrs. Connie! I enjoyed helping you and Tony! Hope to see y'all again! Thanks so much! Stephanie

name: Stacey Wilson
text: Most genuine, sweetest folks! They have a huge selection of gorgeous jewelry at all different price ranges. I highly recommend them!

resp.text: You are so sweet Stacey!! Thanks for the kind words!

name: Lafondraetta Lanier
text: Lorrie was knowledgeable and very helpful. I’ve had my Pandora bracelet for years and haven’t purchased new charms so I was really happy for her experience. There were lots of choices for me to choose from and there was a sale going on. I highly recommend this store.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Lafondretta!  It was a pleasure meeting you and I hope you will come back and visit us when you're in town!    Kindest Regards, Lorrie

name: Sue Carol
text: The associate was awesome! She recommended some beautiful jewelry, one that I did purchase. Also had links removed from a new watch which they did right away! Highly recommend this jewelry store!!

resp.text: Thanks Mrs. Sue!! I hope you're enjoying your jewelry! :)

name: Sandy Dobrzynski
text: I was looking for Pandora charms and earring hoops.  They had both and a very helpful sales  lady helped me out.  When I got back to Wisconsin I immediately put them together and absolutely love my Orange Beach bracelet. ( May have to get matching charms for my earrings too)

resp.text: Thank you Sandy! Congrats on your Pandora purchase and please let us know if we can help you in any way. Check out our website...you can order online and we will be happy to ship you anything.

name: Janice Murphy
text: My very first Pandora purchase couldn’t have been better! Lorrie was wonderful and endured my endless, newbie questions with warm, friendly professionalism. Our stop at Diamond Jewelers was fun and informative. We will definitely be back!

resp.text: Janice, I thoroughly enjoyed your visit, and was so happy to meet your friends, as well!  Please come back to see us when you're in Gulf Shores....and don't forget to call me with your Wish List!

name: Lenora Neal
text: I purchase a Pandora Charm each time we take a vacation.  Diamond Jewelers in Gulf Shores has  great selection of Pandora Charms!  Their staff is very friendly and helpful.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind word Lenora 🦋

name: Kimberly Ray
text: Always a wonderful experience at Diamond Jewelers! Everyone on staff - Daphne, Dawn, Lori, Mary Kathryn & Stephanie are so welcoming and easy to work with. It only took 10 minutes from the time I went in until I had picked out what I wanted, had it rang up, paid for and wrapped beautifully. Thank you ladies for all of your hard work!

name: Kyle Sparks
text: I just went in to the store to see if they sold engagement ring boxes. The one I have is very noticeable when in my pocket. They only sold ones with their name on it. They were very professional in telling me so. As I walked back to the parking lot the lady flagged my back down and brought me 2 very nice boxes that she was able to find and wished me good luck. Free of charge. That saved me a lot of troubles. Thank you

resp.text:
Kyle,
Thank you so much for taking your time to write this sweet experience.  We are so glad we could help you with something that seemed so simple.  If you ever need anything at all, don't hesitate to call.  Congratulations!
Dawn

name: April DePaola
text: The ONLY jeweler to use!!!  I stopped in today expecting to have to leave my jewelry for repair but they took care of it on the spot. Great selection of jewelry and the employees are the most helpful without being pushy for a sale. It’s worth your while to stop in and look periodically just to see the new items they’ve received in the estate area too. :-).

resp.text:
You are so sweet April! I enjoyed seeing you and that precious baby boy! It's always a pleasure helping you! Thanks for your kind words! :)
Sincerely,
Stephanie

name: Jessica OBanner
text:
I've been coming to Gulf Shores for years.  This past trip was memorable like all the rest. However, I wanted to add some Pandora Charms to my bracelet to commemorate this visit. I googled to see if there were any jewelry stores in the area that carried the brand. Diamond Jewelers have an entire section of Pandora Merchandise. I was warmly greeted as soon as I entered the store. **There wasn't that awkward silence like someone is estimating how much you're going to spend.**  The saleswoman was informative, patient, and attentive. Great customer service will always leave a lasting impression. I'll definitely be returning.
J. from Jackson, MS

name: Kew Taybi
text: This was my first purchase at this jewelry store. They came highly recommended by a friend and I was not disappointed. The sales lady who met me was most helpful and give me several options at very reasonable prices.

name: Linda Richmond
text: I just made my first purchase from Diamond Jewelers this past week. They were very professional, friendly and helpful. They have a great selection of jewelry and all at great prices. I will definitely be returning to make future purchases.

name: Tom Martin
text: Having recently moved to Gulf Shore, this was our first visit to Diamond Jewelers.  We could not have been more impressed with the extensive knowledge and friendliness of the entire sales staff.  Stephanie was exceptional patiently guiding us through their large estate jewelry inventory.   Diamond Jewelers is now our “go to” jewelry store for all our fine jewelry purchases.

resp.text:
Tom,
Thank you so much for your sweet review.  We are so happy to have you in our area and are glad you feel at home with the store! I'm always here to help if you need anything at all!
Sincerely,
Stephanie

name: Barbette Driver
text: I stopped in Diamond Jewelers to get a battery replaced in a waterproof watch and the staff welcomed me as if I did business in there often and was a regular customer.  The jeweler also fixed a necklace.  The charge was very reasonable .  I highly recommended them for your jewelry needs.

name: Wendy Ingram
text: Jewelry repair top notch! Exceptional customer service with Lorrie as well. Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you Wendy! Hope you have a great rest of your summer 🌴🌞🍉

name: Pam Harris
text: Delightful Experience! The staff was very professional, knowledgeable, and personable. I loved working with Dawn  -- She provided personized service...going the extra mile to ensure that I was completely satisfied with my purchase.  What I valued most was her genuine excitement and happiness for me - she made it fun!!!!!  Looking forward to my next shopping experience at Diamond Jewelers!

name: Phyllis Britt
text: I initially went to Diamond Jewelers two years ago to buy the Gulf Shores Pandora charm for our daughters, daughter in laws and granddaughter.  Since then I have bought many Pandora charms for birthdays and Christmas.  Last Fall I broke a favorite paisley necklace, took it by to see if they could repair.  They did !!  Yesterday they helped me get new battery for my husband's watch.  I cannot say enough how nice everyone is. So glad I found them and would recommend them to friends and family.

resp.text: thank you Phyllis for the sweet generous feedback. Thank you for letting us serve you!

name: Jan Marsh
text: I asked that DJ  find a specific stone for a ring and a setting to accommodate a specific carat weight of diamonds around the stone — all within a budget amount. They quickly got in two stones and two settings to meet these requirements for me to see. I selected the stone and setting and the finished ring (which they shipped to me) far exceeded my expectations. I love my sales person -Dawn. She worked tirelessly with many calls, texts pictures etc to make this happen.

name: Phil Payne
text:
It is always a great experience shopping at Diamond Jewelers. Jeff the owner always greets everyone with a smile as well as all the wonderful ladies that work there
Great selection of all kinds of diamonds and ladies jewelry
Always a pleasure to shop there

resp.text: We appreciate the kind words Phil! Thank you and Lisa for choosing us, we are blessed to have you as faithful customers ❤️

name: dennis holland
text: great experiance

resp.text: Thank you Dennis!

name: Mark Scarborough
text: The entire staff at Diamond Jewelers are always friendly and very helpful when I visit. Best jewelers in the area!

resp.text: Thank you Mark! We appreciate the positive feedback

name: Clara Hendrix
text: Everyone is so nice and helpful at the store. Stephanie has always helped me find the perfect gift. She has always made me feel special.

resp.text: Thank you Ms. Clara! It's always so good to see you! Take Care! Stephanie

name: Gerald Sanders
text:
Wonderful people. Excellent customer service. Always  a pleasure to do business with  Diamond Jewelers.

.

name: Penny Groux
text: Shopping at Diamond Jewelers is always a wonderful experience.  The care and personal attention given to customers is unparalleled and their knowledge and advice is always sincerely appreciated.  I’m so thankful I found such a great jeweler here on the beautiful Alabama Gulf Coast!

resp.text: You are the sweetest Penny! Thank you for the sweet message. Hope you guys have a blessed Christmas 🎄

name: Robert Lancaster
text: Very friendly,  helpful,  knowledgeable and accommodating.  Oh, and reasonable prices. What more could you ask for? My new hometown jeweler!

name: Steve Peralta
text:
Great place to shop for jewelry.
Lorrie Kruk helped me again find the right gift for my wife. She is always so sweet and helpful. Everyone there is also very nice.
I like shopping local so I keep them on my list of places I go for quality merchandise and impeccable service.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Steve, for your kind words!  It's always a pleasure seeing your smiling face!  I hope your wife loves her gift.  I look forward to your next visit!  ...... Lorrie

name: Phyllis Britt
text: This is my favorite jewelry store.  They are my go to store for Pandora charms for gifts and they have really cool Gulf Shores and Orange Beach Pandora charms.   Also saw new Orange Beach and Gulf Shores bracelets that use the letters to close bracelet.  It’s in my birthday and Santa lists. ❤️

name: Stephanie Gatlin
text: Diamond Jewelers is truly the best jewelry store in the heart of Gulf Shores.  I have been apart of the Diamond Jewelers family for 5 years, and I couldn't think of a better place to spend my days.  When customers walk through the door, we want them to feel right at home.  Diamond Jewelers is not only a business, but also a happy place where customers leave as friends.  We strive to go above and beyond for every jewelry need. We genuinely appreciate every person that comes in, and strive to give them a wonderful experience.

name: Janet Ayers
text:
Called in advance to make sure they had what we were looking for and walked in and they had just what we asked for. Gulf Shores inspired beads for my Pandora Braclet. They had so many great beads but they had several with Gulf Shores initialed on them. We made our choice and had an easy transaction.

Thanks Diamond Jewelers for helping us. I will be back. I own a Vacation Rental - Sand Dollar #9 -Right Foot Riveria - Gulf Shores and will be referring my guest your way for that perfect souvenir.

resp.text: Janet, thank you for the sweet message. So glad we could help you with your jewelry needs and we appreciate the referrals 💕

name: Kelli McKee
text: Always a pleasure!  Watch repair on multiple watches and removed links while I waited.  Plus it smells wonderful.  They have a candle for sale that is to die for!  Amazing staff.

name: sumatra drayton
text:
Stephanie was super nice and very helpful.
They have a great selection of Pandora charms. I just love my Gulf Shores charm!

resp.text: You're so sweet Sumatra! It was a pleasure helping you! I hope you enjoy your charm! We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Take Care! Stephanie

name: Linda Hallmark
text: Always shop here during our trips to the Shrimp Festival. Great selection of Pandora charms and jewelry. Staff is very friendly and helpful which makes shopping enjoyable. Jewelry is reasonably priced.

name: Kyle H
text: Perfect store.. visited to look around with my wife. Went back in to buy a pair of ear rings, was given a cute gift bag. Looks great, she will be very very happy.

name: Lisa Fourroux
text: I've had great experiences with jewelry repair. I purchase my Pandora gifts at Diamond Jewelers, as their customer service and variety of Pandora make my shopping experience worthwhile. The staff is professional and attentive.

name: Lisa Gentry
text: This is the best place to get Pandora! The staff is very knowledgeable and friendly.....my go to at Gulf Shores!

resp.text: Thank you Lisa💝 We appreciate you

name: Cynthia Mayo
text: I came in looking for a Pandora bracelet for my mother.   Lorrie Kruk was amazing!  She took time to show me all of the different charms and clips, helping me put together the PERFECT bracelet for my mom!  I am so excited and can’t wait to give it to her.  Thank you Lorrie and Diamond Jewelers!

name: Ed Rawle
text: Staff was polite, very helpful and friendly! Five star service!

resp.text: Thank you Ed! We appreciate the positive feedback

name: Sue Foskett
text: They gave me a fair price to fix my rings.  Thank goodness I came in that day or I would have lost my main diamond.  I had not had my prongs checked in some time and won't make that mistake again.

name: Eric Saxe
text: Great place and great people to do business with. They go out of their way to make you feel exceptional. Would definitely buy from them again.

resp.text:
Thank you, Eric for your business! It was a pleasure helping you! We look forward to seeing you in November! Take Care!
Stephanie

name: Ross B.
text: Always willing to take time to help find the perfect gift!  Thanks Goodman’s and Stephanie you guys are great.

resp.text: Thx Ross! We appreciate the great feedback

name: Linda Thomas
text: This is a fine store!  It is family owned and operated.  They and their employees are wonderful   They will graciously meet your every need and do their best to make your dreams come true.

resp.text: thank you Linda for the feedback

name: Carol Birch
text: Immediately upon entering the store, I was greeted with a smile and a warm hello by a sweet, young lady named Stephanie.  It was my first visit to the store, as I am a snowbird from Illinois.  I initially went in to have a box chain repaired, but walked out after having placed an order for a Vahan bracelet.  There's a pretty pair if Vahan earrings that I will probably end up purchasing prior to heading North.  Stephanie was a delight and I will probably return to the store just to tell her hi!

resp.text: You are the sweetest Mrs. Carol! It was such a pleasure meeting you and showing you around the store.  I know you're going to enjoy your bracelet! I look forward to seeing you again soon!! Take Care! Stephanie

name: Dayna Brannan
text:
I visited the store today and was overwhelmed by the customer service I received by Stephanie. She helped me pick out a bracelet for mine and my wife’s first grand baby. . I will recommend your store and Stephanie to my friends and family. #eternallygrateful..

Thank you,

David Brannan

resp.text:
David,
Thank you so much for coming in and allowing me to be a part of this exciting time! It was a joy to help with a bracelet to represent baby Lilly! I look forward to seeing you and Mrs. Dayna soon! Congratulations on the new Grandbaby!
Sincerely,
Stephanie

name: Kim Hall
text: I've been dealing Dawn and Diamond Jewelers for years and I've had excellent service and been treated like family.

resp.text:
Kim, we are just so thankful to know you and so appreciative of your business. Thank you for taking time for the kind message
Dawn

name: Sheree' Parker
text: Great customer service,  definitely plan on going back for future purchases.

resp.text:
Thank you Sheree! Thankful for your business.
Blessings 💝

name: Raven Rogers
text: I wish I would've gotten the name of the wonderful lady who took care of us while we were there! She was awesome!!! If you're looking for a Pandora charm, this is the place 😁

name: Ann Suggs
text:
The sales person, Lorrie, was extremely friendly and helpful. The store had many beautiful and unique items and Lorrie was very knowledgeable of the merchandise.
It was a pleasure to do business there. I look forward to shopping with them again!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words! Come see us again

name: L Pennell
text: Very professional and friendly sales staff. Large Pandora selection. Highly recommend stopping here during your beach stay.

resp.text: Thank you Jana! Hope to see you again 💕

name: Mary Licavoli
text: The ladies at Diamond Jewelers were wonderful!  They were energetic,  friendly, and so helpful. I was having fun trying on the items of Julie Vos, and I love the Julie Vos bracelet I purchased!!.  These ladies were so helpful in giving us places to eat, as we wanted to avoid the "tourist trap" dining spots.  We loved everything about Gulf Shores, Diamond, beach, weather,  and most of all,  the people are so, so nice!

resp.text: Mary, hope you and your husband found some great places to eat! We love the Julie Vos and it’s easy to get excited over. Hope y’all are having a great time. Come back and we’ll play with some more JV 💕

name: Cierra Dison
text: Beautiful selection, beautiful people, and a beautiful store! Very patient and helpful as well.

name: Linda Duke

name: Cassi Wolski
text: I cannot say enough things about this jeweler! They have a beautiful high quality selection. We worked with Stephanie and she was so sweet patient and professional.  We purchased a new setting for my engagement ring solitaire while we were vacationing there and my solitaire fell out(after 10 years). They helped me select the perfect ring. We put it in layaway as our 10th anniversary was in December(this happened in June). I forgot to snap a picture of it while we were there so I called Stephanie and she happily got it out of the safe and put it on her own finger and sent me pictures via text message. She went above and beyond! We were shopping with our kids and they offered them chocolates and water. We called to have my diamond placed in the new ring on Wednesday of this week and they placed it on the same day we called and overnighted the ring to me for free. I live 6 hours from Gulf Shores. It was at my door the next morning. It is so beautiful! I am so thankful we went there to see about getting my original ring repaired and ended up with a gorgeous new ring that has special meaning since it was purchased at one of my favorite vacation spots. If you need a jeweler you can trust and who has a gorgeous selection give them a try. 👍🏼👍🏼

text: I have been in this store multiple times and received excellent service in the past but due to the service that I recently received I will not be returning. When I arrived to get a quote from the jeweler the woman behind the counter was exceptionally rude and condescending. While speaking with the jeweler the woman continued to make rude and unnecessary comments and even told the jeweler to have me take the products elsewhere. I left the store feeling inadequate and even embarrassed. Based solely on this experience, I will not be returning and would not recommend this business.

resp.text:
Graham,

I just read your review, and I wanted to apologize from the bottom of my heart for your experience yesterday.  I’m sorry I didn’t realize that you had been in.  I know the situation was not handled in the best manner, but I will say the store was short three employees yesterday making for a very hectic day.  I feel certain the associate was feeling overwhelmed and it was not intentional by any means.   I know you and I had a great rapport, and I hope that you will let us make it right in the future.

name: redheaded stepchild
text: Glitz & Gowns carries glamorous dresses, shoes and accessories. You're greeted with a warm smile by the owner and team. If you are seeking a unique dress for your wedding, prom or pageant this is the boutique on your must list!

name: Norma Mealing
text: Margie is EVERYTHING!!!!!  My daughter and I had never been here but am so glad that we went.  The front desk and other staff members were very friendly.  Margie helped my daughter pick out her Senior prom dress.  I know my daughter tried on 30 or more dresses ( no exaggeration) and Margie seemed excited and happy to pull every last one of them.  My daughter finally settled on the last dress that she tried on and is very pleased with the dress.  We actually spent around the same with Glitz & Glam as we did last year renting a gown with another local company. Thank you to GLITZ & GOWNS for everything.  You all are truly the best!!

name: Amber Barefield
text: Very knowledgeable staff and very very polite!!!! Brooke was a great help! Highly recommend her!! We went for my nieces first pageant dress and she was so helpful!!!!!

name: Minah Pope
text: The staff is amazing.  My daughter is plus size and they had a great variety of dresses in stock for her to choose from.  I will definitely shop here for my youngest one and her pageant needs.

name: Kate Ferguson
text: I wish I could give them 100 stars!! Today was our first visit. The Selection was amazing and big, with all different prices from low to high.  I couldn't have asked for better help. From the lady at the front door all the way to the people behind the counter. Everyone was so pleasant and helpful. Lindsey, the women who helped my teenage daughter find the best dress, was wonderful! She was incredibly knowledgable about everything. She was honest which I love. She had us set up from dress all the way to jewlery. We will DEFINITELY be back for any future dress needs. Thank you to everyone!!!

name: Belinda Cook
text: Glitz and Gowns is an awesome example of what customer service represents. They bend over backwards to make their customers happy. Lindsey is excellent at her job and offers great suggestions.

text: Thank you glitzy and gowns for my daughter amazing prom dress. The people there was so nice and welcoming when we came in and also helpful. Keep up the great job. If anyone asks me if this is a great place to come for prom dresses or any type of gowns then I will say yes.

My daughter and I came into your shop 3 weeks ago for her school pageant dress. It was a wonderful experience. She had never been in a pageant before. The sweet girl who helped us let her try on almost ever dress in her size.  They were kind,  helpful and very patient. Thank you so much.
Christy

name: Joseph Bibb
text: My daughter Alyxandra, my wife and I came here to look for a pageant dress for her National American Miss formal Wear competition. Prior to coming here, we had looked at other dress stores and they were either too glitzy or too mature. So we finally come here. We tried on almost every dress in the store and we finally found "The One" Even though it was past their closing time, they still graciously allowed us to stay 45 minutes after! The staff was amazing, especially Gracie. There was a huge selection of dresses and you could tell that the staff completely knew what they were talking about! Thank you guys so much!!!

resp.text:
Mr. Bibb,

Thank you so much for your detailed 5-star review. We take our customer service very seriously and believe we out-perform other stores in the area in this regard. We appreciate you recognizing this and telling the world about it!

name: Lori Beyard
text:
Seaborn was so very helpful with my questions when I called before going up to the shop (which is super nice by the way). Based on the information he was able to relay to me and his ability to ease my worries on product quality, I immediately headed that way. Both he and the clerk working were just as wonderful and helpful in person. I haven't used the product long enough yet but I'm sure it will be great after finding out about the quality control they have and the fact that their product is organically grown. Thank you guys!

EDIT: I have since had a chance to try their Delta 8 product. His formula and it being clean and organic makes it extra special. Helped with my pain level exponentially.  Highly recommend this shop. And they will answer and and all questions you may have. Wide range of CBD products besides Delta 8. Soaps and creams too. Wonderful experience!!

name: John Lott
text: We have been to Denver, and other multiple dispensories, Well Rooted is by far the best. Knowledgable, courteous. Great to tell my testimonoy and hear how CBD is healing people. Thank you for helping people live fruitfull lives.

name: Travis Tew
text: Top quality products and great selection!  Very friendly and knowledgeable staff!!  Highly recommend for all your CBD products!

resp.text: Thanks for coming in Travis!  We look forward to seeing you soon!

name: Jeff Atkins
text: High prices. Products are good. Lady there said she was guessing on what product to recommend.

resp.text: Good Morning Jeff!  Thank you for your business!  We try our very best to recommend a product that is appropriate to each customer.  Sense we are all react differently to natural remedies,  sometimes our suggestion is simply taking our best guess at what might work best for you.  We pride ourselves in having the best pricing in town when it comes to high quality products & we hope you are having great results & we hope to see you again soon!

name: joyce lewis
text: I’m so forever grateful for you guys at Well Rooted. I had to stay in Dothan for about 6 months with my dad while he was sick. My brother introduced me to these guys and it really help stimulate my mind. I started giving my dad a smoke of the Sour Space candy CBD at night, and eventually his kidneys started working over time. My left knee is healed, I no longer need a cane to walk with. My dad ended up passing away the last Saturday in, September of 2020. I’m back home in, Jacksonville and will forever remember you guys.

name: Dawn Finch
text: Really friendly and knowledgeable. Wonderful products and cute store.

name: Rob Harrell
text: Really cool little shop!  Very relaxing atmosphere with friendly and well informed customer service!  Different from all the other pop up CBD stores.  This place is legit and truly dedicated to enriching the lives of their customers. There is also cool, unique art and furniture for sale. I use the soaps and gummies isolate. Great natural way to take the edge off. They truly have something for everyone!

name: Grayson Wood
text:
Well Rooted has a warm and friendly atmosphere. The customer service is attentive and informative. They have a lot of unique art created by local artists. They also have vintage furniture. I have seen something new every time I go. They have a wide array of CBD products to choose from as well.

I got a small cool sculpture for my coffee table and a vinyl. The CBD products I have gotten from them met all of my expectations, excellent quality.

name: Pamela Hallford
text: The shop is just the cutest thing with awesome artwork, home decor items and vintage furniture! They have something for everyone with the friendliest staff in town.  Love it!

name: Amanda Kay Whiddon
text: Amazing CBD store!  The store's decor and atmosphere is simply breathtaking.  Peaceful and serene.   The store manager was very helpful, knowledgeable and thoughtful.  Not only do they have top quality CBD products but they are also the hub for local artists to showcase and sell their crafts.  The best smelling candles from a locally owned business are readily available to sample and you can even bring in your grandmother's favorite piece of crystal  or whatnot and they will make it into a one of a kind candle for you!  Music on vinyl from local musicians, artwork from local professional and little amateurs who are surely on their way to becoming pros in the future!  Where can you find that perfect vintage Coach bag?  Yes...right here.  Perhaps the Best Rooted place in Dothan in my opinion.  10 stars!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for coming in and for your review!  We are glad you enjoyed your experience!

text: Love Carroll's in Trussville! The staff is very compassionate and attentive. They consistently go the extra mile in making sure I understand everything about my medications. Their reminder service is fantastic! I'm never out of my medications.

text: Best pharmacy hands down! They are always so helpful and friendly! The drive-thru is super convenient as well!

text: The nicest people. Great hometown feel with personal service. My wife and I will go nowhere else....

name: Aquarius X2
text: I was with Tyner's for many years. They have one very rude pharmacist, but everyone else was nice. I have a particular medicine and my body can only handle a particular brand. Otherwise I get sick. Tyner's use to keep them in stock for me. One day I was basically told to go elsewhere. In a bind, I went to Carroll's. I was so amazed at the customer service. They only had 25 of what I needed. They gave me those and wrote out a red card for me to come back the next morning for the rest! They ordered what I needed right then and was able to have the rest the next day! I've never been able to do that anywhere!! I will never go back. Tyner's said they didn't have them and didn't know when they would have them again!

name: Natalie Sanders
text: Filled my prescriptions quick and everyone was very nice I will continue to use this pharmacy

text: I love Carroll Pharmacy! After using big chain stores, I will never go anywhere but Carroll's. The staff is super attentive, quick, and they care about you. They have a drive thru you can use for prescription pick up. It is definitely worth going in the store though. They have an amazing selection of jewelry, boutique clothing, gifts, candles, and much more. They also have a whole football section with local school merchandise. Just a great place!

text: This is THE most beautiful boutique ever! Kayla and her staff are so sweet and knowledgeable of fashion and how to style you for any event. Not only is their clothing selection gorgeous they also have the best jewelry and feature many local jewelry artists to support local businesses.

name: Anna Lee
text: Elitaire Boutique is absolutely the best shopping experience in Huntsville. Kayla, the owner, and her sweet team are so amazing at helping you find what you need. Their selection is AMAZING, they are always rotating in new clothing and accessories, and it’s the perfect place to shop for gifts as well. They make you feel comfortable and welcome, and Kayla puts so much love into her store. I love love love this Huntsville staple so much!

resp.text: Wow Anna thank you so much for these words! We are so thankful for you!

name: Lauren Fitz-Gerald
text: This boutique is the absolute best! I have found so many of my favorite pieces here and Kayla is so good at finding great brands and styling any outfit for any occasion!

name: Chelsea Kennedy
text: I have found my new favorite shop!  Everything in the store is unique and beautiful.  Kayla is so sweet and helpful, and she has such an eye for classic style.  I would seriously wear anything in the store!  I would encourage you to make time to stop by.  Five stars all the way!

resp.text: Chelsea, it was such a pleasure meeting you!! Thank you so much for the kind words and we are here for anything you need!!

name: Emily Rogers
text: I love shopping at Elitaire. The entire team is knowledgeable and can help you find the best items or looks for your specific style or event. Affordable and high quality, you can tell that Kayla hand picks every single item with her clientele in mind. This is also a great spot for affordable and thoughful jewelry that lasts & other great gifts. Wonderful local products from makers in Huntsville. Also, great atmosphere to shop in. Not pushy or overwhelming - comfortable and open environment to have fun and dress up! Cannot recommend enough. Walkable to coffee shop, downtown restaurants and more. Support this place!

resp.text: We can not thank you enough for this amazing review, Emily! Thank you so much for all the kind words!

name: Karen Shipman
text: Elitaire is every woman's boutique!  Here you will find clothing that is classy, timeless, beautiful and one of a kind to Huntsville!!! Kayla has always had impeccable style!! She brings classic and elegant clothing that can take you from the office  right to the wonderful events around town. It is truly a blessing to see her dream finally come true. Come shop with her soon!!! You will not be disappointed!!!

name: Samantha Taylor
text: Hands down my FAVORITE place to shop for clothes in Huntsville. The owner is the sweetest and is so helpful every single time I come here. She has on numerous occasions helped me pick out some of my favorite pieces in my closet. She has the best selection of clothes and shoes--truly unlike any other boutique as far as the quality and style. LOVE this place and would highly recommend this store to everyone! :)

resp.text: Thank you so much for your amazing review, Samantha!! Your kind words have made our day!!!

name: Keeping Up with the Hogans Franthony and Harper
text:
Absolutely gorgeous boutique, effortless, welcoming customer service, very knowledgeable about the product.
Kayla was beyond sweet and professional, while also being genuine and fun!
Prices are perfect for the area's demographics and very fair.
Thank God there wasn't a blouse for $300!! ;)

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review!! We SO enjoyed meeting you!!

text: The owner was very helpful and sweet! The shop is organized and not cluttered looking. Happy with my boots, though they were just a tad too snug. I recommend coming here!

name: Raine
text: I had an amazing experience with The Olive Branch! I am so used to just going on Teleflora for flower deliveries that I didn't know what to do when I needed flowers but Teleflora didn't deliver to the city that I needed. I googled and came across 3 options. One of which was permanently closed...I called The Olive Branch and was overly pleased by the excellent customer service offered by store employee Marshea and store owner, Robin. They were extremely patient with me (I am super picky) and clearly wanted to make sure that I was satisfied with the final product. If I ever need an arrangement in this  part of Alabama again, they will no doubt be the ONLY place that I call.

text: Great place for everything.  Go see them.

name: Richard Yard
text:
This pharmacy is the best! They will always fill a patient’s prescriptions! Unlike most pharmacies, you can get more than one prescription of the same pain killers by more than one doctor in the same week. Oh, and you can send friends to pick it up for you because they don’t believe in wasting one’s time w ID-ing. FINALLY, there’s a place out here in our beautiful, red, trump and god fearing city of Athens that just gets it, you know? Oh my gosh I haven’t even gotten to the best part about filling w this place...they deliver! Yes, even xanex. right to your door!
This place truly is a gem. They offer creatively overpriced (to some) children’s toys, scarfs, sodas, cigarettes and highly controlled substances at ease! If you’ve been bouncing around w your RXs and are worried about where to go, look no further! Get all of them filled here! Thanks limestone drug!

name: Joshua Southard
text: Limestone Drug always brings me back to my childhood just walking in seeing the old school ice cream and drink counter. But as pharmacies there are none that compare to the treatment of care and polite employees who are there to help you with your meds and talk to you about other things that are good for you. They treat every customer like it's was there family and has the ol country style of hospitality and helpful. 10 stars❗

name: Suzette Powers
text:
Great pharmacy and wonderful honest people. Super nice pharmacist very kind great honest people and kind sweet girls who take your script for the pharmacist to fill and they are very fast accurate. I'm 68 yrs old and I remember when the building Limestone Drugs is in wss a bank and I remember when Tom Dean moved the Soda Fountain over to the bank building from Gilbert's Drug Store and my parents and my brothers has been using Limestone Drug Store since it opened on the corner of the square in the old bank building. Great to have a company that's as old as Limestone Drugs.
Thanks S. Powers

She will make you feel like it is all about you  & help you pick out what is right for you! I will be back to this location for sure.

I had no option but to change him on the floor. Putting the most valuable thing you’ve been given in life on a bathroom floor is more than upsetting and very degrading. name: Opal Hall
text: I went there today, and they have some great sales on boutique clothing. Very reasonably priced, unlike some of the other boutiques around. They were making way for football season, with cute clothes and accessories for Alabama and Auburn fans, alike. They had great deals on jewelry and accessories like sunglasses. The owner was very friendly, and even offered me a quiet space for my fussy baby. She even had a little room set up with a chair and wooden changing station for breastfeeding and changing babies. She even had spare disposable diapers stocked. That was so thoughtful. I will definitely be going back, and will add photos next time. This place is worth checking out.

text: Love the special attention

name: Samantha Zorn
text: The owners know what they are doing! They have great taste and  will go out of their way to not only give you the look you desire, but they are also accommodating to your schedule. We have NEVER had a bad experience here and we’ve used them for everything....  prom, pageants, work, gifts! They really do dress the best!! I definitely recommend shopping at Elan!

name: Julie Stewart
text: If I could give one star, I definitely would. My daughter has never been "prom dress shopping", so this was a special event for her. We drove 2+ hours to Elan, and we were greeted as we entered the store. Everything else from that point was terrible. My daughter tried on several gowns and the salesgirl held the train on each dress as I took a photo of my daughter in it - never one time did she ever ask us not to take photos of the gowns. After my daughter had tried on about 4-5 dresses, one of the other salesgirls commented "we don't really like for y'all to take photos of the tags", to which I said I was sorry and we stopped taking photos of the tags on the gowns. I was unsure why, but I assume it is because their gowns are marked up well over retail. After my daughter tried on 1-2 more gowns, an older lady walked over to us and very rudely yelled at my daughter if she was taking pictures she would have to delete all of them before leaving the store. She also said "I know two of my girls have already told you to stop taking pictures". This is untrue, as the only person who had previously said anything was the salesgirl (not ours) that said not to take photos of the tags. I could see my daughter was very visibly upset, so we said thank you and left the store. They lost my business forever, as well as everyone I know that I can tell about our experience. My daughter commented when we left that she never wants to go prom dress shopping ever again, so I am really upset that these incredibly rude girls have ruined this experience for my daughter.

resp.text: This customer was not treated anything but wonderful in our store. She was greeted upon arrival and employees spent hours catering to her every need.  If mistreated the entire time no one would spend 2 hours in a store. Upon entry into our store on the front door and posted at every dressing room are NO photography signs. That is our store policy due to customers like this one.  Once a gown is purchased you are more than welcome to take all the photos you would like. This specific customers after being asked twice not to take photos continued to take pictures of Gown tags and photos of gowns. If you plan to purchase a gown in our store there would be no need to take photos of our tags. All of our gowns are priced the same as any other retailer so you will not find it cheaper unless it is a used product. After being asked repeatedly to not take photos and the customer blatantly in front of employees & other customers continuing to not follow store policy she was asked very politely by the store manager to please delete any photos taken in our store as it is against store policy. No one ever raised their voice at this customer nor were they mistreated in any way.  They were kindly asked to follow the store policy like every other customer. This customer then left our store after taking up hours of employees’ time, trying on our product, finding her correct size and went on resale sites posting exactly what size she needed and photos of herself in our merchandise in our store trying to find it at a used price. We are a small business trying to succeed after a struggle with Covid and customers like this one are the reason we have store policies in place to try to combat people taking advantage of hard working individuals and businesses.

name: Charlotte Williams

text: Britley Parker is awesome!

name: Kara Cave
text: Very lukewarm experience with this place. The stylist offered a 9 am appointment. She walked in at 9:05 and was ready for me at about 9:15. If she hadn’t planned on being there on time, why inconvenience the customer? The color looked really good, the haircut was not. My cut is pretty simple. At the end of the appointment, Ana Maria informs me that she does not accept credit cards. She did not tell me this when I made the appointment. No one told me this while I was waiting for her to arrive. Instead, I was instructed to go across the street to the ATM. She did have a vague sign posted that she accepted cash or that checks could be made out to her. She did not have any wiring transfer services set up. Those services can be set up in the same time I spent waiting for her to arrive. She seemed to be under the impression that I am here to make her life easier. For 125.00 for cut and color I hoped that she would have made a bit more effort. Maybe other stylists at the same facility would be better, but I was really disappointed.

name: Lindsay Stumpf
text: Went to hair n motion Saturday and saw Ana to get my hair cut and thinned out before my wedding in July, scheduled a shampoo cut and style. Didn't get a shampoo or a style at all. when I sat down, told her what I wanted, layered, and thinned out. She cut half my hair blunt across the bottom and when I corrected her she proceeded to layer the rest of my hair but didn't go back and layer what she had already cut. I have half layered hair that is also longer one one side than the other. And no time to fix it before my wedding without needed to cut off more of my hair than I wanted.  I've used them before, but the last few times have been sub par and disappointing. Definitely finding somewhere new.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback.  We are sorry you were not happy with the outcome. We have several other stylists to consider next time you need hair services.

name: Dana Mobley
text: Mandy is incredible! I've never had a stylist be so patient with me before. Today was my first visit to this salon, and I was nervous walking in to my appointment. I told Mandy my concerns with my hair and she instantly made me feel comfortable. She took the time to talk with me and understand what I wanted with my hair, and made sure I was happy with the planned cut before she even picked up her scissors. She gave me a wonderful cut, and I feel so confident and beautiful! I can't wait to visit again.

name: Cecilia Werder
text: I have only recently moved to the Enterprise area so I have no clue of where to go and who to trust with my hair. I had ask for recommendations but was not sure of them because not everyone can work well with thick course Hispanic hair. I have had a terrible hair experience in my past and because of that I am extremely picky about who I let cut and style or touch my hair. I decided to make a choice of my own and give this salon near my house a try and I am so glad I did.  Daniella did such an amazing job on my hair. She thinned it out, trimmed it and did some color touch up. She listened to what I wanted and gave me just that. I am sure I was her challenge for the day since I had gone without a haircut for quite some time again out of fear that my hair would be a mess. I was pleasantly surprised and will be back for sure. As a matter of fact my next appointment will be to try out a massage.

Then, she went above and beyond on covering my grays, the tone is perfect and the highlights are so professional looking! What a blessing she is! text: I had a terrible experience first she cut the bottom of my hair totally uneven and then I told her only and inch and she cuts 3 inches she didn't enteract with me at all no conversation at all but where I'm come from you  pay 20+ dollars for a cut and style but no I was left with dirty greaser hair than I came with , I normally go to a place where they cut wash and curl my hair for 30 but I decided to explore different Solons and I was charged $28 for this terrible experience and to top it off  she sprayed water in it so it was a poofy mess I would not recommend spending your money here.

name: Savannah Smith
text: DO NOT GO! WORST CUSTOmEr SErvICe!!!!! Went in today I went in to the salon today after making an appointment.have always put my kids first and haven't had my hair done professionally in years. I came in and was told that they'd be with me in a second. My hair dresser was late and then my name was called and i wasn't introduced. She just walked into the other room.(I wasn't told where to go.) I got to the chair and sat down. She took my purse out of my hands and out of my lap. I guessed she noticed my face when she did that and asked if that was ok. I said it was just never had someone take my purse out from me like that. She asked if I knew what I wanted to do with my hair. I told her I hadn't gone in 5 years and wanted to talk about what would be best health wise to do w my hair w color.she said "you didn't bring a picture? Or anything? Usually when I sit in a stylists chair I already know what I want to do." I said well I thought I could discuss it. I ended up saying blonde highlights. (I probably had an attitude at this point Bc of how she had been toward me.) she hair dried my hair roughly. Then left without saying a word for a couple minutes. Came back and tried ripping off the cape she had on me saying he wasn't doing my hair today. She want use to rude customers... I said she came off very ...she cut me off and said that she was done. I said she was the rude one and went to the receptionist by the door and told them what had happened and one women.(looked like the manager or whatever.) said sometimes ppl don't mesh well but that there were plenty of other salons I could go to. I said "no sorry?" ... I told her and the gossipy women around her that I was going to be writing reviews and I left...... Now I have worked in customer service for multiple years and have never been allowed to treat a customer (rude or difficult) in such a manner. I've never had a problem w any other place I've ever been too. Obviously if u want to be treated like you value don't go there. If u want to be greeted nicely or to have a consultation go somewhere else. Hair in motion has behavior and customer care problems.

text: It's and awesome place.The owner and employees are so nice . And they are very helpful.. if you want your money's worth I recommend sunCatchers
